Profile.WelcomeDescription:
You are on the project language-simulator. The project allows you to improve your language skills using modern AI technologies. Use ChatGPT to review new topics and fix existing ones.

The resource will keep statistics of your sessions in the matter of studying materials and completing tasks, use this information to understand where you go next!

You need to select an active profile to continue using the resource. Use an existing profile or create a new one. Later you can easily change the active profile.
Profile.StorageWidgetHelpText:
Because the project is not commercial and does not receive any financial support, we are not able to rent a server to store user data.
All your data is stored in a local repository provided by the browser, but it is limited to a certain amount.
Profile.StorageCardMemoryControl: Here you can manage the application data. In case of a memory shortage, you can clear some data to free up memory.
Profile.StorageCardLimitControl: You can change the amount of memory for the application if you have changed the value in your browser.
Profile.StorageCardStatistic: And as a cherry on the cake you can study the statistics by the memory used in the app!
